channel.title: 508 & 317 Question [Answered]
channel.description: Im just going to keep this open, i suppose as conversations are still underway.

item.title: 508 & 317 Question [Answered]
item.dc:creator: @Project_Zlap Project Zlap
item.description:
@Project_Zlap wrote:

let me get this straight… Lets pretend by your stated above logic that all over the web templates are similar to mine correct? So you want me to impress people by taking a extra 300 hundred hours to make something special. How about this. You show me a website you made without any CMS, has to be PHP based as mine is. (making it fair) and create a template, you will realize it is no easy task. ( btw a template is like outline of the site, CSS is where it gets designed to become something great) (I also stated to you in a PM that i didnt mean to show off and that this website is only like a 2 day project, and that i was sorry if i upset you while taking to coon, you want something special, pay for it, and any web designer knows content is better then design, the design is only there to “Buy” you.)

This will be my last reply to you on this board unless you post a picture of “YOUR” website.

By the way, the conversation was between me & coonhunter. I guess i should of PM him instead of leaving it open for everyone to read and fight against.

Although i must thank you. Your reply did not include “Noob,idiot,fag,queer” you actually pointed out something and it was not general, Not only that but you did not use lower class grammar. Also you did not make fun of my Website you just stated it was Basic. Nothing to show off, for that i respect you.

P.S:

I was trying to make it basic, I did not want people to think i was selling something, and just click away. Plus with any complex PHP website, loading is always a problem. I had to find a medium.

Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 & 317 Question [Answered]
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

wow. that looks…

                        Basic.

templates like that can be seen all over the web. nothing special. looks boring actually.

doubt you got a template that can impress anyone here, but certainly keep trying.

item.title: 508 & 317 Question [Answered]
item.dc:creator: @Project_Zlap Project Zlap
item.description:
@Project_Zlap wrote:

Had a bad day at work… my bad everyone, but, i still meant the same basic thing to Coonhunter…, BTW not a kid, wish i was lol. Ooh sure ill show you my creation, since i code PHP, CSS, HTML, learning python, and javascript. (not java totally diffrent things) ok ill post a pic, but i wont show name b/c i dont want it to be cracked as it has almost no security what so ever…

Nothing much to look at of cource, as it is new, but i do have a TLD & Support. Runs me a few $$ but worth it.

I also am creating a website for Cut & Edge company, and creating a warez site. Also creating a pocket knife website, & ebay store.

Also creating a game (C++) not java. (Much harder, but nothing impossible) (i like java better…)

I can send you pics of all my (godly creations)…

NOT TRYING TO SHOW OFF, JUST TRYING TO SHOW YOU OFF MY BOARD…

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

me needs halp with campiler?!
i iz no noob i made delta

campiler sayz can find javac

halpme??..

why do simple questions always result in flaming…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2009, 10:43:38 pm[/size][hr]

Btw your website looks like pure crap, learn some HTML, CSS, Python or something. Get a god damn $5 domain, or did you not recieve your allowance this week… go mow the lawn and you might be able to afford it.

mind showing us your godly creation?

item.title: 508 & 317 Question [Answered]
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

[quote=“Kihomura, post:6, topic:287623”][quote author=Frell link=topic=380283.msg2858918#msg2858918 date=1247039025]

The number represents the client version.

cache version.
[/quote]
Last time I said “cache version” I was corrected and told that there’s no version to a cache, so I’m just going to say client version.[/quote]
It’s cache though. It reads through the client and can be changed via client. Like I could make my client think it was a version 100435 but it still have 317 cache.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 & 317 Question [Answered]
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“Project Zlap, post:9, topic:287623”]ooh, ok thank you for saying “no offense” when you obviously meant offense, ok stupid ass idiot, when i was coding with mopar when it first started there wasn’t a need to create a client right stupid ass? right… they provided it, all i had to do was code the server… not just take one and then change the name & images as i am sure you obviously did. I made about 4 servers and i quit because people like you who dont think before they post, made the SYIPKPKER event…

BTW Fag No offense.

P.S:

i wanted more info into those damn numbers stupid ass… i obviously know about the updates and shit i knew what they stood for but not what they meant… like 317 is the client as it was in the year, that type of shit.

wow, so you knew a site excisted 4 years ago wow!!! your amazing… you are some kind of golden god…

then you said you signed up last year wow… that makes sense, so you never coded anything, because any coder here will tell you he has on more then one occasion has asked for help or more info.

You say this but have no proof, then make fun of me because what i said using your bullshit masters degree in Bullshitting people as the weapon.

Btw you have to answer a question… yah… i dont give a shit about your spic of a life. I need a answer.

BTW i dont give a shit about being banned, it only takes about 5min to undo. (just thought that might be your next “answer” since you dont know what a “question” is or requires)[br][br][size=4]Posted on: July 08, 2009, 03:54:16 pm[/size][hr]Btw your website looks like pure crap, learn some HTML, CSS, Python or something. Get a god damn $5 domain, or did you not recieve your allowance this week… go mow the lawn and you might be able to afford it.

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2009, 03:56:51 pm[/size][hr]One more thing… all you have to do is click “source” on the website and you get the banners code… not that anybody wants it.[/quote]Nothing to get mad about.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 & 317 Question [Answered]
item.dc:creator: @Project_Zlap Project Zlap
item.description:
@Project_Zlap wrote:

Decided to delete as i wrote it out of being pissed at a generality and used it against Coon. Although i still disagree with his ethics answering, i know when i have made a mistake. I am sorry to anyone offended by what i wrote.

I am also sorry to coon, although i still believe what he wrote was offensive, but i don’t know the guy, maybe he just meant it seriously as “No offense” who knows, but i am not going to assume anything so i have decided to delete this.

I am not doing this to get a better rank or what ever you might receive out of doing this, if anything. Just thought i might add that =P lol.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 & 317 Question [Answered]
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Project Zlap:

I have been hearing lots of shit on this subject, 317, wtf are these numbers, BTW im not a noob to this shite, i was coding mopar when it was barely even famous. So please no comments like that. So please give me a def, for all numbers please.

No offense dude, but you are a noob. If you were coding mopar before it was “famous” then you would know what those numbers ment. I first found out about this site about 4 years ago but never signed up until last year. Just to get my first account muted and banned. It took me about 10 minutes to realise what those numbers ment. So i dont see the troubles a “before it was famous” type of coder like yourself would have.

Read full topic
